Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.streams

Class JsonStaxParser

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.streams.JsonStaxParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonStaxParserInterface, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<JsonStaxParserLexType>, java.util.Iterator<JsonStaxParserLexType>
public class JsonStaxParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonStaxParserInterface

This class implements a StAX-styled JSON parser to use in the in-stream JSON parsing application. Usage of this class is:

try(final JsonSaxParser parser = new JsonSaxParser(<any reader>))){
for (LexType lex : parser) {
// Process content ...
}
}

JSON format is according to RFC 7159

This class is not thread-safe.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
RFC 7159, JsonStaxParserLexType, JUnit tests
LastUpdate:
0.0.3
